verses.text: \f + \fr 34:1 \ft Psalm 34 is an acrostic poem, with each verse starting with a letter of the alphabet (ordered from Alef to Tav).\f*\w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H6440"\w* bless \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* \w times|strong="H6440"\w*. \w His|strong="H1732"\w* praise \w will|strong="H6440"\w* always \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* soul \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w boast|strong="H1288"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* humble \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad.

Oh magnify \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*. \w Let|strong="H8055"\w*’s exalt \w his|strong="H3068"\w* name \w together|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* sought \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* answered \w me|strong="H7311"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7311"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* fears.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w looked|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H3068"\w* radiant. \w Their|strong="H3605"\w* faces \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* never \w be|strong="H3068"\w* covered \w with|strong="H3068"\w* shame.

\w This|strong="H6440"\w* poor \w man|strong="H6440"\w* cried, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* heard \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* saved \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* troubles.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s angel encamps around \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* fear \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivers|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

Oh taste \w and|strong="H3068"\w* see \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* good. Blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* man \w who|strong="H3068"\w* takes refuge \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w him|strong="H5439"\w*.

Oh fear \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* saints, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H7200"\w* lack \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* young lions \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w lack|strong="H4270"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* suffer hunger, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w lack|strong="H4270"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* good \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*.

Come, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* children, \w listen|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1875"\w*. \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* teach \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* someone \w who|strong="H3068"\w* desires life, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* loves many days, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* see good?
\w Keep|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* tongue \w from|strong="H3117"\w* evil, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* lips \w from|strong="H3117"\w* speaking lies.
Depart \w from|strong="H7451"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w do|strong="H8193"\w* good. Seek peace, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* pursue \w it|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s eyes \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w toward|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* righteous. \w His|strong="H5493"\w* ears listen \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* cry.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w face|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* evil, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* cut off \w their|strong="H3068"\w* memory \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* righteous cry, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* hears, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* delivers \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w troubles|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* near \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* broken \w heart|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w saves|strong="H5337"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* crushed spirit.

Many \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* afflictions \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* righteous, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivers|strong="H3467"\w* \w him|strong="H3068"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H7665"\w* \w all|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* protects \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* bones. \w Not|strong="H7451"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* broken.

Evil \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* kill \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked. \w Those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* hate \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* condemned.

\w The|strong="H4191"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* redeems \w the|strong="H4191"\w* soul \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H8130"\w* servants. None \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w those|strong="H8130"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H8130"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w condemned|strong="H7563"\w*.
